A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I would have loved to have read the internet's reaction if it had been around when The Empire Strikes Back was first released. The bad guys win! Luke Skywalker loses his hand! Han Solo is turned to stone! Luke's new teacher is a muppet?! Darth Vader is Luke's DAD?! What the F&@^?!\" The latest installment of Star Wars has outraged some people\, but what else is new? I take their dashed expectations with a grain of salt.
